misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm.
description: The use of the URL constructor to create a URL object without specifying the protocol can lead to a man-in-the-middle attack, where an attacker can intercept the URL and change it to a malicious one.
recommendation: Always specify the protocol when creating a URL object, for example, 'https://www.facebook.com'.
